select id as id, name as title, info as info, image as image from t_credit_coupon where home_kind = 'markets' and status = 0

select distinct coupon.id as id, coupon.name as cardName, coupon.info as cardTxt, coupon.image as cardImg, coupon.coupon_desc as details, if(store.id, true, false) as isStar from t_credit_coupon coupon left join t_store store on store.path = concat('#/service/specials/detail/', coupon.id) where coupon.id = :id and coupon.status = 0
select 0 as id, '全部优惠' as name from t_coupon_kind union select id, name from t_coupon_kind where status = 0

select id from t_store where user_id = :userId and kind = :kind and path = :path and status = 0
insert into t_store(user_id, name, kind, path, create_time, status) select :userId, name, :kind, :path, now(), 0 from t_credit_coupon where id = :id and status = 0
delete from t_store where user_id = :userId and kind = :kind and path = :path and status = 0
select id, report from t_zx where name = :name and idNo = :cardNo and idType = :idType and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(now()) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(create_time) < 15552000
insert into t_zx(name, idNo, idType, loginName, passWord, mobileTel, tcId, email, create_time) values(:name, :idNo, :idType, :loginName, :passWord, :mobileTel, :tcId, :email, now())
update t_zx set report = :msg where loginName = :loginName
